name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine is joined by Kobo Kanaeru and Ayunda Risu for a screenshot pose segment. They suggest various poses including a 'seiso' side pose, 'pargoy' dance, and a Valorant-inspired 'entry' pose.
After Kobo and Risu leave, Reine welcomes her senpais, Tokoyami Towa and Oozora Subaru. They decide to speak only Japanese. Reine brings out a cleaning duster and asks for pose requests using it.

subtitles.original: Wah, ini suaranya diterawang aja ya? Kalian kenalan dulu dong kepada para viewers.
subtitles.english: Wow, so the voices are just being sensed, huh? You guys, please introduce yourselves to the viewers first.

subtitles.original: Oh ya, halo teman-teman.
Aku, uh, definitely not in toilet, Ayunda Risu, Hololive Indonesia Gen 1.
subtitles.english: I'm, uh, definitely not in the toilet, Ayunda Risu, Hololive Indonesia Gen 1.

subtitles.original: Yay! Terus sebelahnya?
Aku boko-boko-boko-boko Kanaeru at your service,
subtitles.english: I'm boko-boko-boko-boko Kanaeru at your service,

subtitles.original: kohai kesayangan Pavolia Reine, Putri Merak, Kobo Kanaeru desu!
subtitles.english: Pavolia Reine's favorite junior, the Peacock Princess, Kobo Kanaeru!

subtitles.original: Asek! Oke! Yay! Oke!
Kalau gitu, aku di sini aku mau meminta kalian untuk request-request pose untuk screenshot time gitu nggak sih?
subtitles.english: In that case, I'm here... I want to ask you guys for some pose requests for a screenshot time, right?

subtitles.original: Screenshot? Apa aja boleh sebenarnya. Baik-baik saja juga seru gitu lho.
subtitles.english: Screenshot? Anything goes, really. Just being 'seiso' (pure) is also fun.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu yang seiso dulu ya, yang seiso. Aku tadi tuh ya tercengang-cengang melihat pose Reine dari samping.
subtitles.english: In that case, let's do a pure one first. I was just amazed looking at Reine's pose from the side.

subtitles.original: Aku mau Reine pose menyamping pegang pinggang.
subtitles.english: I want Reine to pose sideways with hands on her hips.

subtitles.original: Gini maksudnya? Ayi!
Kameranya dari samping! Kameranya dari samping!
subtitles.english: Camera from the side! Camera from the side!

subtitles.original: Wuih, besar sekali!
Kayak gini? Oh my God!
Aduh, encok! Encok! Ini aduh sakit punggung gitu.
subtitles.english: Ouch, my back! Back pain! My back hurts.

subtitles.original: Beda aduh beda!
Ini dikretek-kretekin enak kayaknya! Aduh!
subtitles.english: It feels like it needs a good cracking! Ow!

subtitles.original: Aku! Aku! Yes, yes, yes, what?
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Yes, yes, yes, what?

subtitles.original: Bobogile... Oi aku, aku duluan apa Risu dulu nih?
subtitles.english: Bobogile... hey me, me first or Risu first?

subtitles.original: Bebas, bebas, bebas!
subtitles.english: It's up to you, up to you!

subtitles.original: Ya udah, ya udah. Enggak deh, Risu dulu deh. Apa deh?
subtitles.english: Alright then. No, Risu first. What is it?

subtitles.original: Ya udah, ya udah, aku ya. Aku ya.
Tadi pose di samping tapi tangan satunya tuh nunjuk ke bibir.
subtitles.english: The side pose from before, but with one hand pointing to your lips.

subtitles.original: Ngerti nggak?
Gimana sih?
Tangan kanan tetap pegang pinggang.
subtitles.english: Right hand stays on the hip.

subtitles.original: Agak korslet nih.
Beda lho.
Gimana? Tangan kirinya tuh kayak sst, sst, sst. Diam, diam, diam.
subtitles.english: How? The left hand is like 'shh, shh, shh'. Quiet, quiet, quiet.

subtitles.original: Oh, oke. Ya gitu deh pokoknya. Ya agak sebisanya ya guys.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay. Well, something like that. I'll do my best, guys.

subtitles.original: Atahai! Bisa gini.
Ih, sias, sias! Way, bangun!
Oke lah, boleh lah, boleh lah. Aku deh aku sekarang nih.
subtitles.english: Okay then, it works. Now it's my turn.

subtitles.original: Pargoy sekarang!
Pargoy? Pargoy itu kayak apa ya?
Pargoy itu kayak apa?
Nggak tahu deh, sedapat lu aja deh.
subtitles.english: I don't know, just whatever you can do.

subtitles.original: Itu buset goyang ngebor! Ngebor!
Tante jangan, Tante!
Olesen! Goyang ngebor!
Generation gap! Bisanya goyang ngebor.
subtitles.english: Generation gap! All I can do is the drill dance.

subtitles.original: Tante jangan! Ya ampun Tante jangan, jangan ngebor!
subtitles.english: Tante, don't! Oh my god, Tante, don't drill!

subtitles.original: Yes! Ya habis itu pose apa lagi nih?
subtitles.english: Yes! So what's the next pose?

subtitles.original: Terakhir, terakhir.
Yang lain, bentar-bentar nih.
Apa lagi? Lu, lu ini Tante.
subtitles.english: What else? You, you do this, Tante.

subtitles.original: Pose lari mau entry ke Site A.
subtitles.english: Pose like you're running to entry Site A.

subtitles.original: Oh ya, oke-oke. Gue bisa banget tuh.
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, okay. I can totally do that.

subtitles.original: Ayo. Gila sih pakai Vandal, pakai Vandal.
subtitles.english: Let's go. Crazy, use a Vandal, use a Vandal.

subtitles.original: Enemy Site A! Enemy Site A!
subtitles.english: Enemy Site A! Enemy Site A!

subtitles.original: Headshot!
Tidak-tidak, cek corner soalnya ya.
subtitles.english: No, no, I forgot to check the corner.

subtitles.original: Makasih ya sudah datang.
Makasih ya sudah ngundang kita juga ya.
Ya, aku senang banget. Izin pinjam kolam renangnya ya, bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'm so happy. Permission to use the pool, okay? Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Hah? Bye-bye!
Ya udah sih. Paling nanti dicegat satpam.
subtitles.english: Whatever. You'll probably be stopped by security.

subtitles.original: Thank you Kobo and Risu from Hololive Indonesia for memeriahkan my tea party!
subtitles.english: Thank you Kobo and Risu from Hololive Indonesia for livening up my tea party!

subtitles.original: Well, but it looks like we got even more guests!
subtitles.english: Well, but it looks like we got even more guests!

subtitles.original: Who do you think is going to show up next?
subtitles.english: Who do you think is going to show up next?

subtitles.original: They're my senpais.
Japanese mode.
もしもーし！聞こえますかー？
わー！ハロー！
Reineー！
Holo Indonesia! Congrats!
トワ先輩、スバル先輩、来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Towa-senpai, Subaru-senpai, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: 今日は、えっと、English? English? Japanese?
Which language? English or Japanese?
English or Japanese? Japanese only, please! Yes!
subtitles.english: English or Japanese? Japanese only, please! Yes!

subtitles.original: Yes, Japanese only でお願いします、please!
Ok, Japanese only, Towa-senpai and Subaru-senpai desu ne!
subtitles.english: Okay, Japanese only for Towa-senpai and Subaru-senpai!

subtitles.original: おねがいしまーす！よろしくお願いします！
ね、あの、今回はですね、ちょっとあの、スクリーンショットタイムのために何かあの、リクエストを受けてますよ。
subtitles.english: So, for this occasion, I'm taking some requests for a screenshot time.

subtitles.original: おー！
どんなポーズがいいか、あ、でも、まずね、ちょっとだけマジック。
subtitles.english: What kind of pose would you like... but first, a little bit of magic.

subtitles.original: マジ？マジ？ちょっとだけ？
マジック！わー！
何、何、何？
クリーニングはたきです！
クリーニングはたき！クリーニングはたき！
そうですね、このはたきで何かポーズリクエストとかありますか？
subtitles.english: That's right. Do you have any pose requests using this duster?

subtitles.original: そのはたきでポーズ？すげー難しいんですけど。
subtitles.english: A pose with this duster? That's really difficult.

subtitles.original: はい、はい、はい！
